title: Speeding-truck crashes into parked truck, leaving one dead in Nankana Sahib
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 2 (APP): A devastating accident occurred at Motorway M3 Nankana Sahib on early Friday morning when a moving truck collided with a parked truck, resulting in the tragic loss of one life on the spot.
According to details, Rescue 1122 said the impact was severe, causing significant damage to both vehicles and in a result of accident one person was killed while other one was serious injured, a private news channel reported.
Police and rescue teams reached the spot after being informed and shifted the dead and injured to a nearbyÂ hospital.
